member.name: T:Solari.Data.Access.Models.Airline
member.summary: A schema for an airline.

member.name: P:Solari.Data.Access.Models.Airline.Icao
member.summary: A unique three letter identifier (PK).

member.name: P:Solari.Data.Access.Models.Airline.Iata
member.summary: A two letter identifier (not unique).

member.name: P:Solari.Data.Access.Models.Airline.Name
member.summary: The name of the airline

member.name: P:Solari.Data.Access.Models.Airline.Flights
member.summary: A aggregated list of flights flying for the airline.

member.name: T:Solari.Data.Access.Models.Airport
member.summary: A schema for an airport.

member.name: P:Solari.Data.Access.Models.Airport.Icao
member.summary: A unique four letter identifier (PK).

member.name: P:Solari.Data.Access.Models.Airport.Iata
member.summary: A three letter identifier (not unique).

member.name: P:Solari.Data.Access.Models.Airport.Name
member.summary: The name of the airport.

member.name: P:Solari.Data.Access.Models.Airport.City
member.summary: The city of which the airport adheres to.

member.name: P:Solari.Data.Access.Models.Airport.DepartingFlights
member.summary: A aggregated list of flights scheduled to depart the airport.

member.name: P:Solari.Data.Access.Models.Airport.ArrivingFlights
member.summary: A aggregated list of flights scheduled to arrive the airport.

member.name: P:Solari.Data.Access.Models.Flight.FlightNumber
member.summary: A unique identifier between 3 and 6 letters (PK).

member.name: P:Solari.Data.Access.Models.Flight.Status
member.summary: A optional status message for the flight.

member.name: P:Solari.Data.Access.Models.Flight.DepartureTime
member.summary: The estimated time of departure.

member.name: P:Solari.Data.Access.Models.Flight.ArrivalTime
member.summary: The estimated time of arrival.

member.name: P:Solari.Data.Access.Models.Flight.DepartureGate
member.summary: The identifier of the departure gate at the departure airport.

member.name: P:Solari.Data.Access.Models.Flight.BaggageBelt
member.summary: The identifier of the baggage belt at the arrival airport.

member.name: P:Solari.Data.Access.Models.Flight.DepartureAirport
member.summary: The aggregated object representation of the departure airport.

member.name: P:Solari.Data.Access.Models.Flight.DepartureAirportIcao
member.summary: The ICAO code of the departure airport (FK).

member.name: P:Solari.Data.Access.Models.Flight.Airline
member.summary: The aggregated object representation of the arrival airport.

member.name: P:Solari.Data.Access.Models.Flight.AirlineIcao
member.summary: The ICAO code of the arrival airport (FK).

member.summary: Gets all airlines in repository.

member.summary: Gets airline by ICAO code.
member.param: The airlines three letter ICAO identifier.

member.name: M:Solari.Data.Access.Repositories.SqlAirlineRepository.AddAirlineAsync(Solari.Data.Access.Models.Airline)
member.summary: Adds an airline to the repository.
member.returns: The added airline entry in the repository.

member.summary: Updates an airline in the repository.
member.returns: The updated airline entry in the repository.

member.summary: Delete an airline from the repository.
